revision.text:
== New here ==
Just wanted to ask why the wiki name doesn't have an accent e in the title? (i.e. PokéClicker) [[User:Bawitdaba|Bawitdaba]] ([[User talk:Bawitdaba|talk]]) 18:41, 11 August 2022 (UTC) :I am not the one who created the Wiki, and I would have accented the title. Unfortunately, changing the name of the wiki seems to be a more complicated task than I am willing to go through with right now. [[User:Jk13|Jk13]] ([[User talk:Jk13|talk]]) 01:01, 12 August 2022 (UTC)

== New here ==
Just wanted to ask why the wiki name doesn't have an accent e in the title? (i.e. PokéClicker) [[User:Bawitdaba|Bawitdaba]] ([[User talk:Bawitdaba|talk]]) 18:41, 11 August 2022 (UTC)

{{Infobox dungeon |name = Mt. Moon |image = [[File:Mt._Moon.png]] |caption = A map of Mt. Moon. |tokens = 75 |location = East of Pewter City, between Route 3 and 4. }} '''Mt. Moon''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kanto]]. It has 25 tiles arranged in a 5x5 square, including 5 chest tiles, 13 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Random Encounters==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Encounter !! Base Health !! Trainer !! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Sandshrew.png|40px]] Sandshrew || rowspan=11|<center>834 || [[File:Bug_Catcher.png|40px]] Bug Catcher Kent || [[File:Weedle.png|40px]] Weedle, [[File:Kakuna.png|40px]] Kakuna || rowspan=11|<center>75 |- | [[File:Lass.png|40px]] Lass Iris || [[File:Clefairy.png|40px]] Clefairy |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Clefairy.png|40px]] Clefairy || [[File:Super_Nerd.png|40px]] Super Nerd Jovan || [[File:Magnemite.png|40px]] Magnemite,[[File:Voltorb.png|40px]] Voltorb |- | [[File:Bug_Catcher.png|40px]] Bug Catcher Robby || [[File:Caterpie.png|40px]] Caterpie, [[File:Metapod.png|40px]] Metapod, [[File:Caterpie.png|40px]] Caterpie |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat || [[File:Lass.png|40px]] Lass Miriam || [[File:Oddish.png|40px]] Oddish, [[File:Bellsprout.png|40px]] Bellsprout |- | [[File:Youngster.png|40px]] Youngster Josh || [[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Rattata,[[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Rattata, [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Paras.png|40px]] Paras || [[File:Hiker.png|40px]] Hiker Marcos || [[File:Geodude.png|40px]] Geodude, [[File:Geodude.png|40px]] Geodude, [[File:Onix.png|40px]] Onix |- | [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Rocket Grunt || [[File:Sandshrew.png|40px]] Sandshrew, [[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Rattata, [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat |- | rowspan=3|[[File:Geodude.png|40px]] Geodude || [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Rocket Grunt || [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat, [[File:Ekans.png|40px]] Ekans |- | [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Rocket Grunt || [[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Rattata, [[File:Sandshrew.png|40px]] Sandshrew |- | [[File:Team_Rocket_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Rocket Grunt || [[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Rattata, [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat |- ! Boss !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | <center>N/A || <center>N/A || rowspan=2|[[File:Super_Nerd.png|40px]] Super Nerd Miguel || rowspan=2|[[File:Grimer.png|40px]] Grimer, [[File:Voltorb.png|40px]] Voltorb, [[File:Koffing.png|40px]] Koffing || rowspan=2|<center>2,780 |- |} '''* Must have cleared Mt. Moon at least once to unlock Kabuto and Omanyte'''

Moon 100 Times |- | {{Bag2|Dome Fossil}} || 0.00% || 0.10% || 0.47% || Clear Mt. Moon 100 Times |- | {{Bag2|Moon Stone}} || 0.00% || 0.10% || 0.47% || Clear Mt. Moon 100 Times |}

revision.comment: Added the loot to Mt. Moon with the Format you Wanted :) and ill create the pages for the missing items in this page(principally the first 2 fossils)
